alert.note: Alert for Dundy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 7:09PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: At 608 PM MDT/708 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorm outflow along a line extending from 18 miles northwest of Haigler to 5 miles southeast of Wray to 14 miles northwest of Bonny Reservoir to 7 miles southeast of Cope. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Patchy blowing dust is possible. Locations impacted include... Bonny Reservoir, St. Francis and Bethune. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 421 and 430. Highway 385 between mile markers 192 and 242. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
